Package com.yantra.ycp.japi.ue

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    YCPAccessTokenGenerationUE
    User exit to generate a unique and random access token.
    YCPBeforeCancelTaskUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to cancelTask API.
    YCPBeforeChangeTaskUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to changeTask API.
    YCPBeforeCreateBatchUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to the createBatch API.
    YCPBeforeCreateExceptionUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to createException API.
    YCPBeforeCreateNegotiationUE  
    YCPBeforeCreateTaskUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to the createTask API.
    YCPBeforeTaskCompletionUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to the registerTaskCompletion API.
    YCPBeforeTaskInProgressUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to the registerTaskCompletion API.
    YCPCanTaskBeSuggestedUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to the getNextTask API.
    YCPCheckPasswordsMatchUE
    User exit to determine whether a given password matches an existing password for a user.
    YCPDeleteGDPRDataUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing more information to cancelTask API.
    YCPDetermineLabelFormatUE
    User exit that determines the label format id.
    YCPDeterminePrinterUE
    User exit that determines the device id of the printer.
    YCPDeterminePrintJobNameUE
    User exit that determines pass file name to be printed.
    YCPDetermineTaskTypeUE
    User exit that allows recalculation of CreditedMinutes.
    YCPExceptionChangeNotificationUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for exception change notification.
    YCPGeneratePasswordUE
    User exit to generate password for a user.
    YCPGetCustomerContactListUE  
    YCPGetCustomerDetailsUE  
    YCPGetCustomerListUE  
    YCPGetNegotiationNoUE  
    YCPGetNodeMinimumNotificationTimeUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for providing manipulating the Minimum Notification Time for the a node.
    YCPGetShortZipCodeUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for retrieving short Zip code for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.
    YCPManageCustomerUE  
    YCPMassageApiInputUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for modifying the API Input before it is passed to API.
    YCPMassageApiOutputUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for modifying the API output before it is returned back.
    YCPRecalculateCreditedMinsUE
    User exit that allows recalculation of CreditedMinutes.
    YCPTokenAuthenticationUE
    This user exit may be implemented to provide custom logic for management of user authentication tokens.
    YCPValidateChangedPasswordUE
    User exit to validate and process a password.
